That said, the following interfaces are not typically used in a handler and, for the most part, are completely unnecessary for a handler to work properly and/or as desired.

trans-unit.source: The following settings relate to etcd’s consensus protocol. Chef Backend builds its own leader election on top of etcd’s consensus protocol. Updating these settings may be advisable if you are seeing frequent failover events as a result of spurious etcd connection timeouts. The current defaults assume a high-latency environment, such as those you might find if deploying Chef Backend to various cloud providers.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置与etcd的共识协议有关。Chef Backend在etcd的共识协议基础上建立自己的领导者选举。如果由于伪造的etcd连接超时而导致频繁的故障转移事件，建议更新这些设置。当前的默认设置假定为高延迟环境，例如将Chef Backend部署到各种云提供商时可能会遇到的环境。

trans-unit.source: The four shortcodes are:
trans-unit.target: 这四个短码是:

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in documents) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. Default value: 1000 (every 1000 documents).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（在文档中）。默认值： 1000 （每1000个文档）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in documents) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. This value should be tuned carefully. When data is committed to the Apache Solr index, all incoming updates are blocked. If the duration between updates is too short, it is possible for the rate at which updates are asked to occur to be faster than the rate at which objects can be actually committed. Default value: 1000 (every 1000 documents).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（在文档中）。该值应仔细调整。将数据提交到Apache Solr索引后，所有传入的更新都会被阻止。如果更新之间的持续时间太短，则要求更新发生的速度可能比实际提交对象的速度要快。默认值： 1000 （每1000个文档）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in milliseconds) at which the length of the RabbitMQ queue is checked. Default value: 30000.
trans-unit.target: 检查RabbitMQ队列长度的频率（以毫秒为单位）。默认值： 30000 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which Chef Infra Client runs when running in daemonized mode. We do not recommend running in daemonized mode. Instead you should rely on scheduled execution from system schedulers like systemd timers, cron jobs, or Windows Scheduled Tasks. Default value: 1800.
trans-unit.target: 在守护程序模式下运行Chef Infra Client的频率（以秒为单位）。我们不建议在守护程序模式下运行。相反，您应该依靠系统调度程序（例如systemd计时器，cron作业或Windows Scheduled Tasks）中的调度执行。预设值： 1800 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which Chef Infra Client runs. When running Chef Infra Client at intervals, apply --splay and --interval values before a Chef Infra Client run. Default value: 1800.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client运行的频率（以秒为单位）。间隔运行Chef Infra Client时，请在运行Chef Infra Client之前应用 --splay 和 --interval 值。预设值： 1800 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which Chef Infra Client runs. When running Chef Infra Client at intervals, apply --splay and --interval values before a Chef Infra Client run. This option may not be used in the same command with the --[no-]fork option.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client运行的频率（以秒为单位）。间隔运行Chef Infra Client时，请在运行Chef Infra Client之前应用 --splay 和 --interval 值。此选项可能无法与 --[no-]fork 选项在同一命令中使用。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which a job is started.
trans-unit.target: 启动作业的频率(以秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which jobs are allowed to spawn.
trans-unit.target: 允许作业产生的频率(以秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which jobs are allowed to spawn. Default value: 10.
trans-unit.target: 允许产生作业的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 10 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which messages are sent to the server log files if checkpoint segments are being filled faster than their currently configured values. Default value: "30s".
trans-unit.target: 如果检查点段的填充速度快于其当前配置的值，则将消息发送到服务器日志文件的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： "30s" 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which messages are sent to the server log files if checkpoint segments are being filled faster than their currently configured values. Default value: '30s'.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查点段的填充速度快于其当前配置的值，则将消息发送到服务器日志文件的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： '30s' 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which messages are sent to the server log files if checkpoint segments are being filled faster than their currently configured values. Default value: 30s.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查点段的填充速度快于其当前配置的值，则将消息发送到服务器日志文件的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 30s 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. Default value: 60000 (every 60 seconds).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 60000 （每60秒）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which node objects are added to the Apache Solr search index. This value should be tuned carefully. When data is committed to the Apache Solr index, all incoming updates are blocked. If the duration between updates is too short, it is possible for the rate at which updates are asked to occur to be faster than the rate at which objects can be actually committed. Default value: 60000 (every 60 seconds).
trans-unit.target: 将节点对象添加到Apache Solr搜索索引的频率（以秒为单位）。该值应仔细调整。将数据提交到Apache Solr索引后，所有传入的更新都会被阻止。如果更新之间的持续时间太短，则要求更新发生的速度可能比实际提交对象的速度要快。默认值： 60000 （每60秒）。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. Default value: 1800.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值 1800 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. When the chef-client is run at intervals, --splay and --interval values are applied before the chef-client run. Default value: 1800.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。当厨师客户机间隔运行时，将在厨师客户机运行之前应用 --splay 和 --interval 值。默认值 1800 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. When the chef-client is run at intervals, --splay and --interval values are applied before the chef-client run. This option may not be used in the same command with the --[no-]fork option.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。当厨师客户机间隔运行时，将在厨师客户机运行之前应用 --splay 和 --interval 值。此选项可能无法与 --[no-]fork 选项一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the chef-client runs. When the chef-client is run at intervals, --splay values are applied first, then the chef-client run occurs, and then --interval values are applied.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行的频率（以秒为单位）。当Chef-Client间隔运行时，将首先应用 --splay 值，然后发生Chef-client运行，然后应用 --interval 值。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the primary VRRP server is to advertise. Default value: '1'.
trans-unit.target: 主VRRP服务器发布的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： '1' 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency (in seconds) at which the secondary machine polls the primary. Default value: 20.
trans-unit.target: 辅助计算机轮询主计算机的频率（以秒为单位）。默认值： 20 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which Apt repository updates are made. Use this property when the :periodic action is specified. Default value: 86400.
trans-unit.target: Apt系统信息库更新的频率。指定 :periodic 操作时，请使用此属性。默认值： 86400 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which the operating system writes data on-disk, instead of waiting for more data. Possible values: no (don’t fsync, let operating system flush data), always (fsync after every write to the append-only log file), and everysec (fsync only once time per second). Default value: 'always'.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统在磁盘上写入数据的频率，而不是等待更多数据的频率。可能的值： no （不执行fsync，让操作系统刷新数据）， always （每次写入仅附加日志文件后 everysec fsync ）和everysec（每秒仅一次fsync）。默认值： 'always' 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which unique URLs are generated. This value may be a specific amount of time, i.e. 15m (fifteen minutes) or a percentage of the value of s3_url_ttl, i.e. 10%. Default value: :off.
trans-unit.target: 生成唯一URL的频率。该值可以是特定的时间量，即 15m （十五分钟），也可以是 s3_url_ttl 值的百分比，即 10% 。默认值 :off 。

trans-unit.source: The frequency of the Chef Push Jobs server heartbeat message. Default value: 1000 (milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs服务器心跳消息的频率。默认值： 1000 （毫秒）。

trans-unit.source: The front-end for the Chef Infra Server is written using Erlang, which is a programming language that first appeared in 1986, was open sourced in 1998, and is excellent with critical enterprise concerns like concurrency, fault-tolerance, and distributed environments. The Chef Infra Server can scale to the size of any enterprise and is sometimes referred to as Erchef.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server的前端是使用Erlang编写的，Erlang是一种编程语言，最早出现于1986年，于1998年开源，并且在并发，容错和分布式环境等关键企业问题上非常出色。Chef Infra Server可以扩展到任何企业的规模，有时也称为Erchef。

trans-unit.source: The front-end for the Chef Infra Server is written using Erlang, which is a programming language that first appeared in 1986, was open sourced in 1998, and is excellent with critical enterprise concerns like concurrency, fault-tolerance, and distributed environments. The Chef Infra Server can scale to the size of any enterprise and is sometimes referred to as Erchef.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server的前端是使用Erlang编写的，Erlang是一种编程语言，最早出现于1986年，于1998年开源，并且在并发，容错和分布式环境等关键企业问题上表现出色。 Chef Infra Server可以扩展到任何企业的规模，有时也称为Erchef。

trans-unit.source: The frontend group, comprised of one (or more) nodes running the Chef Infra Server. Nodes in the frontend group handle requests to the Chef Infra Server API and access to the Chef management console. Frontend group nodes should be load balanced, and may be scaled horizontally by increasing the number of nodes available to handle requests.
trans-unit.target: 前端组,由运行Chef Infra服务器的一个(或多个)节点组成。前端组中的节点处理对Chef Infra Server API的请求和对Chef管理控制台的访问。前端组节点应该是负载平衡的,可以通过增加处理请求的节点数量来水平扩展。

trans-unit.source: The fsck device on the Solaris platform. Default value: -.
trans-unit.target: Solaris平台上的fsck设备。默认值： - 。

trans-unit.source: The full ARN of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer master key (CMK) that was used to protect the volume encryption key for the volume.
trans-unit.target: AWS密钥管理服务(AWS KMS)客户主密钥(CMK)的完整ARN,该密钥用于保护卷的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: The full Google Cloud Storage URL where disk storage is stored You must provide either this property or the sourceDisk property but not both.
trans-unit.target: 存储磁盘存储的完整 Google 云存储 URL 您必须提供此属性或 sourceDisk 属性,但不能同时提供。

trans-unit.source: The full URI path that the request will be sent to.
trans-unit.target: 请求将被发送到的完整URI路径。

trans-unit.source: The full URL of the S3 bucket.
trans-unit.target: S3桶的完整URL。

trans-unit.source: The full URL that is used to access Fieri. Default value: 'http://localhost:13000/fieri/jobs'
trans-unit.target: 用于访问Fieri的完整URL。默认值： 'http://localhost:13000/fieri/jobs'

trans-unit.source: The full name must begin with a non-white space character and must be between 1 and 1023 characters. For example: "Chef Software, Inc."
trans-unit.target: 全名必须以非空格字符开头，并且必须在1到1023个字符之间。例如： "Chef Software, Inc."

trans-unit.source: The full name must begin with a non-white space character and must be between 1 and 1023 characters. For example: "Chef Software, Inc.".

trans-unit.source: The full name must begin with a non-white space character and must be between 1 and 1023 characters. For example: Chef Software, Inc..
trans-unit.target: 全名必须以非空格字符开头，并且必须在1到1023个字符之间。例如： Chef Software, Inc. .。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the Chef Infra Server organization. The full name must begin with a non-white space character and must be between 1 and 1023 characters. For example: Chef Software, Inc.. If this option is not specified, the upgrade command will prompt for it.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server组织的全名。全名必须以非空格字符开头，并且必须在1到1023个字符之间。例如： Chef Software, Inc. .。如果未指定此选项，则 upgrade 命令将提示输入。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the Chef server organization. The full name must begin with a non-white space character and must be between 1 and 1023 characters. For example: Chef Software, Inc.. If this option is not specified, the upgrade command will prompt for it.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器组织的全名。全名必须以非空格字符开头，并且必须在1到1023个字符之间。例如： Chef Software, Inc. .。如果未指定此选项，则 upgrade 命令将提示输入。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the Google Compute Engine network to which the instance is connected. If left unspecified, the default network will be used.
trans-unit.target: 实例所连接的Google Compute Engine网络的全称。如果没有指定,将使用默认网络。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the file that will hold the service account private key. The management of this file will depend on the value of sync_file parameter. File path must be absolute.
trans-unit.target: 保存服务账户私钥的文件全名。这个文件的管理将取决于sync_file参数的值。文件路径必须是绝对的。

trans-unit.source: The full or partial URL of the defaultService resource to which traffic is directed if none of the hostRules match. If defaultRouteAction is additionally specified, advanced routing actions like URL Rewrites, etc. take effect prior to sending the request to the backend. However, if defaultService is specified, defaultRouteAction cannot contain any weightedBackendServices. Conversely, if routeAction specifies any weightedBackendServices, service must not be specified. Only one of defaultService, defaultUrlRedirect or defaultRouteAction.weightedBackendService must be set.
trans-unit.target: defaultService资源的完整或部分URL,如果hostRules都不匹配,则将流量导向该资源。如果另外指定了defaultRouteAction,则高级路由操作(如URL重写等)会在将请求发送到后端之前生效。但是,如果指定了defaultService,defaultRouteAction不能包含任何加权后端服务。反之,如果routeAction指定了任何加权的BackendServices,则不得指定Service。defaultService、defaultUrlRedirect或defaultRouteAction.weightedBackendService中只能设置一个。

trans-unit.source: The full or partial URL to the BackendService resource. This will be used if none of the pathRules or routeRules defined by this PathMatcher are matched. For example, the following are all valid URLs to a BackendService resource: - https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/project/global/backendServices/backendService - compute/v1/projects/project/global/backendServices/backendService - global/backendServices/backendService If defaultRouteAction is additionally specified, advanced routing actions like URL Rewrites, etc. take effect prior to sending the request to the backend. However, if defaultService is specified, defaultRouteAction cannot contain any weightedBackendServices. Conversely, if defaultRouteAction specifies any weightedBackendServices, defaultService must not be specified. Only one of defaultService, defaultUrlRedirect or defaultRouteAction.weightedBackendService must be set. Authorization requires one or more of the following Google IAM permissions on the specified resource defaultService: - compute.backendBuckets.use - compute.backendServices.use
trans-unit.target: BackendService资源的完整或部分URL。如果与此PathMatcher定义的pathRules或routeRules都不匹配，则将使用此方法。例如，以下是BackendService资源的所有有效URL：-https: //www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/project/global/backendServices/backendService-compute / v1 / projects / project / global / backendServices / backendService-global / backendServices / backendService如果另外指定defaultRouteAction，则高级路由操作（如URL重写等）在将请求发送到后端之前生效。但是，如果指定了defaultService，则defaultRouteAction不能包含任何weightedBackendServices。相反，如果defaultRouteAction指定任何weightedBackendServices，则不得指定defaultService。仅必须设置defaultService，defaultUrlRedirect或defaultRouteAction.weightedBackendService之一。授权需要对指定资源defaultService的以下Google IAM权限中的一项或多项：-compute.backendBuckets.use-compute.backendServices.use

trans-unit.source: The full organization name must begin with a non-white space character and must be between 1 and 1023 characters. For example: 'Fourth Coffee, Inc.'.
trans-unit.target: 完整的组织名称必须以非空格字符开头，并且必须在1到1023个字符之间。例如： 'Fourth Coffee, Inc.' 。

trans-unit.source: The full user name for an LDAP user. Default value: nil.
trans-unit.target: LDAP用户的完整用户名。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified URL of the VPC network to bind to. This should be formatted like https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/{project}/global/networks/{network}
trans-unit.target: 要绑定的VPC网络的标准URL。格式应为 https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/{project}/global/networks/{network}

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified URL of the VPC network to forward queries to. This should be formatted like https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/{project}/global/networks/{network}
trans-unit.target: 将查询转发到的VPC网络的标准URL。格式应为 https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/{project}/global/networks/{network}

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified URL of the service directory namespace that should be associated with the zone. Ignored for public visibility zones.
trans-unit.target: 应该与区域关联的服务目录名称空间的标准URL。忽略 public 可见区。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified URL to the data collector server API.
trans-unit.target: 数据采集器服务器API的完全限定URL。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified URL to the data collector server API. When present, it will enable the data collector in opscode-erchef. This also enables Chef Infra Server authenticated forwarding any properly signed requests arriving at /organizations/ORGNAME/data-collector to this URL with the data collector token appended. This is also target for requests authenticated and forwarded by the /organizations/ORGNAME/data-collector endpoint. For the forwarding to work correctly the data_collector['token'] field must also be set. For example, if the data collector in Chef Automate is being used, the URI would look like: http://my_automate_server.example.org/data-collector/v0/.
trans-unit.target: 数据收集器服务器API的标准URL。如果存在，它将启用opscode-erchef中的数据收集器。这还使Chef Infra Server能够通过身份验证将添加到数据收集器令牌的任何正确签名的请求转发到 /organizations/ORGNAME/data-collector URL到/ organizations / ORGNAME / data-collector的此URL。这也是 /organizations/ORGNAME/data-collector 端点认证和转发的请求的目标。为了使转发正常工作，还必须设置 data_collector['token'] 字段。例如，如果使用的是Chef Automate中的数据收集器，则URI类似于： http://my_automate_server.example.org/data-collector/v0/ : //my_automate_server.example.org/data-collector/v0/。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified domain name for a node. This is used as the name of a node unless otherwise set.
trans-unit.target: 节点的完全限定域名。除非另有设置,否则将作为节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified domain name for the Supermarket server. Defaults to using the current FQDN for the machine.

trans-unit.source: The fully-qualified URIs that point to your data in Google Cloud. For Google Cloud Storage URIs: Each URI can contain one ‘’ wildcard character and it must come after the ‘bucket’ name. Size limits related to load jobs apply to external data sources. For Google Cloud Bigtable URIs: Exactly one URI can be specified and it has be a fully specified and valid HTTPS URL for a Google Cloud Bigtable table. For Google Cloud Datastore backups, exactly one URI can be specified. Also, the ‘’ wildcard character is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 指向您在Google Cloud中数据的标准URI。对于Google Cloud Storage URI：每个URI可以包含一个' '通配符，并且必须位于'bucket'名称之后。与加载作业相关的大小限制适用于外部数据源。对于Google Cloud Bigtable URI：可以只指定一个URI，并且它是Google Cloud Bigtable表的完全指定且有效的HTTPS URL。对于Google Cloud Datastore备份，可以仅指定一个URI。另外，不允许使用' '通配符。

trans-unit.source: The fully-qualified URL of an Instance Group or Network Endpoint Group resource. In case of instance group this defines the list of instances that serve traffic. Member virtual machine instances from each instance group must live in the same zone as the instance group itself. No two backends in a backend service are allowed to use same Instance Group resource. For Network Endpoint Groups this defines list of endpoints. All endpoints of Network Endpoint Group must be hosted on instances located in the same zone as the Network Endpoint Group. Backend services cannot mix Instance Group and Network Endpoint Group backends. Note that you must specify an Instance Group or Network Endpoint Group resource using the fully-qualified URL, rather than a partial URL.
trans-unit.target: 实例组或网络端点组资源的完全限定的 URL。在实例组的情况下,这定义了服务流量的实例列表。每个实例组的成员虚拟机实例必须与实例组本身生活在同一区域。一个后端服务中的两个后端不允许使用同一个实例组资源。对于网络端点组,这定义了端点列表。网络端点组的所有端点必须托管在与网络端点组位于同一区域的实例上。后台服务不能混合实例组和网络端点组后台。请注意,您必须使用完全限定的 URL 而不是部分 URL 来指定实例组或 Network Endpoint Group 资源。

trans-unit.source: The fully-qualified URL of an Instance Group or Network Endpoint Group resource. In case of instance group this defines the list of instances that serve traffic. Member virtual machine instances from each instance group must live in the same zone as the instance group itself. No two backends in a backend service are allowed to use same Instance Group resource. For Network Endpoint Groups this defines list of endpoints. All endpoints of Network Endpoint Group must be hosted on instances located in the same zone as the Network Endpoint Group. Backend services cannot mix Instance Group and Network Endpoint Group backends. When the load_balancing_scheme is INTERNAL, only instance groups are supported. Note that you must specify an Instance Group or Network Endpoint Group resource using the fully-qualified URL, rather than a partial URL.
trans-unit.target: 实例组或网络端点组资源的标准URL。在实例组的情况下，这定义了服务流量的实例列表。每个实例组中的成员虚拟机实例必须与实例组本身位于同一区域中。后端服务中的两个后端均不允许使用相同的实例组资源。对于网络端点组，这定义了端点列表。网络端点组的所有端点必须托管在与网络端点组相同的区域中的实例上。后端服务不能混合实例组和网络端点组的后端。当 load_balancing_scheme 为INTERNAL，仅支持实例组。请注意，您必须使用完全限定的URL（而不是部分URL）指定实例组或网络端点组资源。

trans-unit.source: The geographic location where the dataset should reside. See official docs. There are two types of locations, regional or multi-regional. A regional location is a specific geographic place, such as Tokyo, and a multi-regional location is a large geographic area, such as the United States, that contains at least two geographic places. Possible regional values include: asia-east1, asia-northeast1, asia-southeast1, australia-southeast1, europe-north1, europe-west2 and us-east4. Possible multi-regional values: EU and US. The default value is multi-regional location US. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: 数据集应驻留的地理位置。参见官方文档。有两种类型的位置，区域性或多区域性。区域位置是特定的地理位置，例如东京，而多区域位置是较大的地理区域，例如美国，其中包含至少两个地理位置。可能的区域值包括： asia-east1 ， asia-northeast1 ， asia-southeast1 ， australia-southeast1 ， europe-north1 ， europe-west2 和 us-east4 。可能的多区域值： EU 和 US 。默认值为多区域位置 US 。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: The hosted Chef Infra Server has the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: 托管的Chef Infra服务器有以下要求。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef Analytics server may be specified using a FQDN or an IP address. This hostname must be resolvable. For example, a Chef Analytics server that is running in a production environment with a resolvable FQDN hostname can be added in the DNS system. But when deploying Chef Analytics into a testing environment, adding the hostname to the /etc/hosts file is enough to ensure that hostname is resolvable.
trans-unit.target: Chef Analytics服务器的主机名可以使用FQDN或IP地址指定。该主机名必须是可解析的。例如，可以在DNS系统中添加运行在具有可解析FQDN主机名的生产环境中的Chef Analytics服务器。但是，当将Chef Analytics部署到测试环境中时，将主机名添加到 /etc/hosts 文件中足以确保主机名是可解析的。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef Infra Server may be specified using a FQDN or an IP address. This hostname must be resolvable, be 64 characters or less, and be lowercase. For example, a Chef Infra Server running in a production environment with a resolvable FQDN hostname can be added the DNS system. But when deploying Chef Infra Server into a testing environment, adding the hostname to the /etc/hosts file is enough to ensure that hostname is resolvable.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用FQDN或IP地址指定Chef Infra Server的主机名。该主机名必须是可解析的，且不能超过64个字符，并且必须小写。例如，可以将在生产环境中运行且具有可解析的FQDN主机名的Chef Infra服务器添加到DNS系统中。但是，当将Chef Infra Server部署到测试环境中时，将主机名添加到 /etc/hosts 文件中足以确保主机名是可解析的。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef Infra Server must be an FQDN, including the domain suffix, and must be resolvable by the backend and frontend servers. See Hostnames, FQDNs for more information.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server的主机名必须是FQDN（包括域后缀），并且后端和前端服务器必须可以解析该主机名。有关更多信息，请参见主机名，FQDN。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef server may be specified using a FQDN or an IP address. This hostname must be resolvable. For example, a Chef server running in a production environment with a resolvable FQDN hostname can be added the DNS system. But when deploying Chef server into a testing environment, adding the hostname to the /etc/hosts file is enough to ensure that hostname is resolvable.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用FQDN或IP地址指定Chef服务器的主机名。该主机名必须是可解析的。例如，可以将在生产环境中运行且具有可解析的FQDN主机名的Chef服务器添加到DNS系统。但是，当将Chef服务器部署到测试环境中时，将主机名添加到 /etc/hosts 文件中足以确保主机名是可解析的。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef server must be an FQDN, including the domain suffix, and must be resolvable by the backend and frontend servers. See Hostnames, FQDNs for more information.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的主机名必须是FQDN（包括域后缀），并且后端和前端服务器必须可以解析。有关更多信息，请参见主机名，FQDN。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the Chef server must be an FQDN, including the domain suffix, and must be resolvable by the other backend and frontend servers. See Hostnames, FQDNs for more information.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的主机名必须是FQDN（包括域后缀），并且必须可由其他后端和前端服务器解析。有关更多信息，请参见主机名，FQDN。

trans-unit.source: The hostname for the listener. For example, --hostname something.mydomain.com or *.mydomain.com. Default value: *.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器的主机名。例如，-- --hostname something.mydomain.com 或 *.mydomain.com 。默认值： * 。

trans-unit.source: The hostname of the instance to be created. The specified hostname must be RFC1035 compliant. If hostname is not specified, the default hostname is [INSTANCE_NAME].c.[PROJECT_ID].internal when using the global DNS, and [INSTANCE_NAME].[ZONE].c.[PROJECT_ID].internal when using zonal DNS.

trans-unit.source: The individual check-in history displays the desktop’s latest status for each day with an associated icon. Hover over a status icon to see the status label. Statuses include “converged” (check box icon), “unchanged” (dash icon), “error” (exclamation point icon), or “missing” (question mark icon). The timescale of the check-in history can also switch between “Last 2 Weeks” and “Last 4 Weeks.”
trans-unit.target: 单独的签入历史记录显示每天桌面的最新状态以及相关的图标。将鼠标悬停在状态图标上可以查看状态标签。状态包括“聚合”（复选框图标），“未更改”（破折号图标），“错误”（感叹号图标）或“缺失”（问号图标）。签入历史记录的时间范围也可以在“过去2周”和“过去4周”之间切换。

trans-unit.source: The individual desktop has an information panel that displays the following data: Overview, Chef Infra Client, System, Virtualization, and Kernel.
trans-unit.target: 个人桌面有一个信息面板,显示以下数据。概述、Chef Infra Client、系统、虚拟化和内核。

trans-unit.source: The individual phases of Chef Automate may be configured, grouped under the delivery-truck configuration setting by phase.
trans-unit.target: 可以配置Chef Automate的各个阶段，并在 delivery-truck 配置设置下按阶段分组。

trans-unit.source: The individual service rows sort by their level of criticality, from the “most critical” status to the “least critical” status - “critical”, “warning”, “unknown”, and “OK” respectively. Individual disconnected services display a broken chain icon with a note of when the last received health check ocurred. The most critical issues appear at the top of the list, allowing you to determine the next steps for remediation.
trans-unit.target: 各个服务行按其严重性级别排序，从“最严重”状态到“最不严重”状态-分别为“严重”，“警告”，“未知”和“确定”。各个断开连接的服务显示一个断开的链状图标，并带有上次收到健康检查的时间的注释。最关键的问题出现在列表的顶部，使您可以确定下一步的补救措施。

trans-unit.source: The information from the SPN can be specified either in the file ~/.azure/credentials, as environment variables, or by using Chef InSpec target URIs.
trans-unit.target: 可以在 ~/.azure/credentials 文件中将SPN中的信息指定为环境变量，也可以使用Chef InSpec目标URI。

trans-unit.source: The initial node count for the pool. You must ensure that your Compute Engine resource quota is sufficient for this number of instances. You must also have available firewall and routes quota.
trans-unit.target: 池的初始节点数。您必须确保您的计算引擎资源配额足以满足这一实例数量。您还必须有可用的防火墙和路由配额。

trans-unit.source: The initial peer(s) is a requirement of any distributed system. In Chef Habitat, a new Supervisor that is starting up looks for an initial peer(s) to join to begin sharing information about the health and status of peers and other services, to increase the health of the overall Ring.
trans-unit.target: 初始同伴是任何分布式系统的要求。在Chef Habitat中,一个新成立的Supervisor会寻找一个初始同伴加入,以开始共享同伴和其他服务的健康和状态信息,以提高整个Ring的健康水平。

trans-unit.source: The initial worker count for the HTTP connection pool that is used by the data collector. Default value: 25.
trans-unit.target: 数据收集器使用的HTTP连接池的初始工作者数。默认值:25。

trans-unit.source: The initial worker count for the HTTP connection pool that is used by the rabbitmq-management plugin. Default value: 25.

trans-unit.source: The inputs and their configuration are listed explicitly in simple YAML in one place - a consumer of your profile does not need to read through the control code to find the inputs.

This can be one of the following. _ CLOUD_SQL_INSTANCE: A Cloud SQL instance that is not replicating from a master. _ ON_PREMISES_INSTANCE: An instance running on the customer’s premises. _ READ_REPLICA_INSTANCE: A Cloud SQL instance configured as a read-replica.

trans-unit.source: The integration between the management console in Chef Infra Server and Chef Automate’s SAML capabilities is done using OpenID Connect.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server中的管理控制台与Chef Automate的SAML功能之间的集成是使用OpenID Connect完成的。

trans-unit.source: The intended purpose of the job: Adaptive, Background, Interactive, or Standard.
trans-unit.target: 工作的预期目的： Adaptive ， Background ， Interactive 或 Standard 。

trans-unit.source: The intent was to fulfill the demands that “users should just be able to name a resource and it should work” with the demands that, for more complicated use cases, users should be able to use provides lines to arbitrarily wire up resources to the Chef recipe language.
trans-unit.target: 目的是为了满足“用户应该能够命名资源并且可以使用资源”的要求，并针对更复杂的用例，用户应该能够使用 provides 行来随意将资源连接到Chef配方语言。

trans-unit.source: The interaction protocol is defined using Google’s Protocol Buffers; it is our explicit goal that all future changes to the protocol will happen in a backward-compatible way.
trans-unit.target: 交互协议是使用Google的协议缓冲区定义的；我们的明确目标是协议的所有未来更改都将以向后兼容的方式发生。

trans-unit.source: The knife command knife configure can be used to generate your initial config.rb configuration file in your home directory. See knife configure for details.
trans-unit.target: 刀命令刀配置可用于在主目录中生成您的初始config.rb配置文件。有关详细信息，请参见刀配置。

trans-unit.source: The knife command knife configure can be used to generate your initial config.rb configuration file in your home directory. See knife configure for details.
trans-unit.target: 刀命令刀配置可用于在主目录中生成您的初始config.rb配置文件。有关详细信息，请参见刀配置。

trans-unit.source: The knife command line tool maps very closely to the Chef Infra Server API and the objects defined by it: roles, environments, run-lists, cookbooks, data bags, nodes, and so on. Chef Infra Client assembles these pieces at run-time and configures a host to do useful work.
trans-unit.target: 刀子命令行工具非常紧密地映射到Chef Infra Server API和由它定义的对象:角色、环境、运行列表、烹饪书、数据袋、节点等等。Chef Infra Client在运行时组装这些部件,并配置主机来做有用的工作。

trans-unit.source: The knife command line tool must be configured to communicate with the Chef Infra Server as well as any other infrastructure within your organization. This is done initially during the workstation setup, but subsequent modifications can be made using the config.rb configuration file.
trans-unit.target: knife 命令行工具必须配置为与 Chef Infra Server 以及您组织内的任何其他基础设施进行通信。这是最初在工作站设置期间完成的,但随后的修改可以使用config.rb配置文件进行。

trans-unit.source: The knife plugin knife-acl provides a fine-grained approach to modifying permissions, by wrapping API calls to the _acl endpoint and makes such permission changes easier to manage.
trans-unit.target: 通过将API调用包装到 _acl 端点，刀子插件knife-acl提供了一种细化的方法来修改权限，并使此类权限更改更易于管理。

trans-unit.source: The labels associated with this Project. Label keys must be between 1 and 63 characters long and must conform to the following regular expression: [a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?. Label values must be between 0 and 63 characters long and must conform to the regular expression ([a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)?. No more than 256 labels can be associated with a given resource. Clients should store labels in a representation such as JSON that does not depend on specific characters being disallowed
trans-unit.target: 与该项目关联的标签。标签密钥必须介于1到63个字符之间，并且必须符合以下正则表达式： [a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])? 。标签值必须在0到63个字符之间，并且必须符合正则表达式 ([a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)? 。一个给定的资源最多可以关联256个标签。客户端应以不依赖于特定字符的表示形式（例如JSON）存储标签

trans-unit.source: The load balancer selects a random healthy host.

trans-unit.source: The load balancing algorithm used within the scope of the locality.
trans-unit.target: 在地域范围内使用的负载均衡算法。

trans-unit.source: The load balancing algorithm used within the scope of the locality. The possible values are - ROUND_ROBIN - This is a simple policy in which each healthy backend is selected in round robin order. LEAST_REQUEST - An O(1) algorithm which selects two random healthy hosts and picks the host which has fewer active requests. RING_HASH - The ring/modulo hash load balancer implements consistent hashing to backends. The algorithm has the property that the addition/removal of a host from a set of N hosts only affects 1/N of the requests. RANDOM - The load balancer selects a random healthy host. ORIGINAL_DESTINATION - Backend host is selected based on the client connection metadata, i.e., connections are opened to the same address as the destination address of the incoming connection before the connection was redirected to the load balancer. MAGLEV - used as a drop in replacement for the ring hash load balancer. Maglev is not as stable as ring hash but has faster table lookup build times and host selection times. For more information about Maglev, refer to https://ai.google/research/pubs/pub44824 This field is applicable only when the load_balancing_scheme is set to INTERNAL_SELF_MANAGED.
trans-unit.target: 在本地范围内使用的负载平衡算法。可能的值为-ROUND_ROBIN-这是一个简单的策略，其中按循环顺序选择每个正常的后端。 LEAST_REQUEST-一种O（1）算法，它选择两个随机的健康主机，并选择活动请求较少的主机。 RING_HASH-环/模哈希负载均衡器对后端实现一致的哈希。该算法具有以下属性：从一组N个主机中添加/删除一个主机仅影响请求的1 / N。 RANDOM（随机）-负载均衡器选择一个随机的健康主机。 ORIGINAL_DESTINATION-根据客户端连接元数据选择后端主机，即在将连接重定向到负载平衡器之前，将连接打开到与传入连接的目标地址相同的地址。MAGLEV-用作替代散列式负载平衡器。磁悬浮（Maglev）不如散列（ring hash）稳定，但具有更快的表查找建立时间和主机选择时间。有关磁悬浮的更多信息，请参阅https://ai.google/research/pubs/pub44824该字段仅在load_balancing_scheme设置为INTERNAL_SELF_MANAGED时适用。

trans-unit.source: The main advantage of applying configuration updates to an individual service through an environment variable is that you can quickly test configuration settings to see how your service behaves at runtime. The disadvantages of this method are that configuration changes have to be applied when the Supervisor itself starts up, and you have to restart a running Supervisor (and thus, all services it may be running) in order to change these settings again.
trans-unit.target: 通过环境变量将配置更新应用到单个服务的主要优点是,您可以快速测试配置设置,以了解服务在运行时的表现。这种方法的缺点是,配置更改必须在Supervisor本身启动时应用,而且您必须重新启动正在运行的Supervisor(因此,它可能正在运行的所有服务)才能再次更改这些设置。

trans-unit.source: The map of Kubernetes labels (key/value pairs) to be applied to each node. These will added in addition to any default label(s) that Kubernetes may apply to the node. In case of conflict in label keys, the applied set may differ depending on the Kubernetes version – it’s best to assume the behavior is undefined and conflicts should be avoided. For more information, including usage and the valid values, see: http://kubernetes.io/v1.1/docs/user-guide/labels.html An object containing a list of “key”: value pairs. Example: { “name”: “wrench”, “mass”: “1.3kg”, “count”: “3” }.

trans-unit.target: 实例的最大磁盘大小,单位为字节。

trans-unit.source: The maximum field length (in number of tokens/terms). If a field length exceeds this value, Apache Solr may not be able to complete building the index. Default value: 100000 (increased from the Apache Solr default value of 10000).
trans-unit.target: 最大字段长度（以令牌/术语数为单位）。如果字段长度超过此值，则Apache Solr可能无法完成索引的构建。缺省值： 100000 （从Apache Solr缺省值 10000 增加）。

trans-unit.source: The maximum field length setting for Apache Solr should be greater than any expected node object file sizes in order for them to be successfully added to the search index. If a node object file is greater than the maximum field length, the node object will be indexed up to the maximum, but the part of the file past that limit will not be indexed. If this occurs, it will seem as if nodes disappear from the search index. To ensure that large node file sizes are indexed properly, verify the following configuration settings:
trans-unit.target: Apache Solr的最大字段长度设置应该大于任何预期的节点对象文件大小,以便它们能成功地添加到搜索索引中。如果一个节点对象文件大于最大字段长度,节点对象将被索引到最大限度,但超过该限度的部分文件将不会被索引。如果出现这种情况,就会出现节点从搜索索引中消失的情况。为了确保正确索引大节点文件大小,请验证以下配置设置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of Elasticsearch snapshots to keep. Default value: nil.
trans-unit.target: 保留的Elasticsearch快照的最大数量。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of allowed concurrent connections. Default value: 350.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最大并发连接数。预设值： 350 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of allowed concurrent connections. This value should only be tuned when the opscode_erchef['db_pool_size'] value used by the opscode-erchef service is modified. Default value: 350.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最大并发连接数。仅当修改opscode-erchef服务使用的 opscode_erchef['db_pool_size'] 值时，才应调整此值。预设值： 350 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of allowed concurrent connections. This value should only be tuned when the opscode_erchef['db_pool_size'] value used by the opscode-erchef service is modified. Default value: 350. If there are more than two front end machines in a cluster, the postgresql['max_connections'] setting should be increased. The increased value depends on the number of machines in the front end, but also the number of services that are running on each of these machines.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最大并发连接数。仅当修改opscode-erchef服务使用的 opscode_erchef['db_pool_size'] 值时，才应调整此值。预设值： 350 。如果一个群集中有两个以上的前端计算机，则应增加 postgresql['max_connections'] 设置。增加的值取决于前端中的计算机数量，还取决于这些计算机中每台计算机上运行的服务数量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of arguments per command line. Default: nil.
trans-unit.target: 每个命令行的最大参数数。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of backup archives to keep. Default value: nil.
trans-unit.target: 要保留的最大备份存档数。默认值： nil 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bad records that BigQuery can ignore when reading data
trans-unit.target: 读取数据时,BigQuery可以忽略的最大坏记录数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of concurrently connected users the share can accommodate.
trans-unit.target: 该共享可容纳的最大并发连接用户数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of connections to the backend cluster. Defaults to 1024.
trans-unit.target: 后台集群的最大连接数。默认值为1024。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of days after which a password must be changed
trans-unit.target: 更改密码的最长天数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of delivery attempts for any message. The value must be between 5 and 100. The number of delivery attempts is defined as 1 + (the sum of number of NACKs and number of times the acknowledgement deadline has been exceeded for the message). A NACK is any call to ModifyAckDeadline with a 0 deadline. Note that client libraries may automatically extend ack_deadlines. This field will be honored on a best effort basis. If this parameter is 0, a default value of 5 is used.
trans-unit.target: 任何信息的最大发送尝试次数。该值必须在5到100之间。递送尝试的次数定义为1+(NACK的次数和消息的确认截止日期被超过的次数之和),NACK是对ModifyAckDeadline的任何调用,截止日期为0。NACK是指任何对ModifyAckDeadline的调用,其截止时间为0。请注意,客户端库可能会自动扩展ack_deadlines。这个字段将在尽最大努力的基础上被尊重。如果该参数为0,则使用默认值5。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of document updates that can be stored in memory before being flushed and added to the current index segment. Default value: 15.
trans-unit.target: 在刷新并添加到当前索引段之前可以在内存中存储的文档更新的最大数量。默认值： 15 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of documents before a soft commit is triggered. Default value: 1000.
trans-unit.target: 触发软提交之前的最大文档数。预设值： 1000 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of failed logins before you are locked out
trans-unit.target: 在您被锁定之前的最大登录失败次数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of files Elasticsearch may open simultaneously. The default value is 65536. Setting this to a lower value may lead to data loss and is highly discouraged.
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch可以同时打开最大文件数。默认值为 65536 。将此值设置为较低值可能会导致数据丢失，因此不建议使用。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of index segments allowed before they are merged into a single index. Default value: 2147483647.
trans-unit.target: 合并到单个索引中之前允许的最大索引段数。默认值： 2147483647 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of instances that the autoscaler can scale up to. This is required when creating or updating an autoscaler. The maximum number of replicas should not be lower than minimal number of replicas.
trans-unit.target: 自动记录器可扩展到的最大实例数。在创建或更新autoscaler时需要这个。复制的最大数量不应低于最小复制数量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of keepalive proves that should be sent before dropping a connection. Default value: 2.
trans-unit.target: 在断开连接之前应发送的最大保活证明数量。默认值： 2 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of log files that will be retained after rotation.
trans-unit.target: 轮换后保留的日志文件的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of memory map areas the Elasticsearch process may have. The default value is 262144. Setting this to a lower value may cause Elasticsearch to fail with out-of-memory errors.
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch进程可能具有的最大内存映射区域数。默认值为 262144 。将此值设置为较低值可能会导致Elasticsearch因内存不足错误而失败。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of messages that can be queued before RabbitMQ automatically drops messages from the front of the queue to make room for new messages. Default value: 10000.
trans-unit.target: RabbitMQ在自动从队列的最前面丢弃消息以为新消息腾出空间之前可以排队的最大消息数。预设值： 10000 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of milliseconds to sleep before retrying a failed attempt to index an item. Retries are delayed a random number of miliseconds between reindex_sleep_min_ms and reindex_sleep_max_ms. Set both this and reindex_sleep_min_ms to 0 to retry without delay. Default value: 2000
trans-unit.target: 重试索引项目失败尝试之前要休眠的最大毫秒数。重试在 reindex_sleep_min_ms 和 reindex_sleep_max_ms 之间延迟随机的毫秒数。将此值和 reindex_sleep_min_ms 都设置为0即可重试而不会延迟。预设值： 2000

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of open connections to PostgreSQL. Default value: 100.
trans-unit.target: 到PostgreSQL的最大打开连接数。预设值： 100 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of parallel requests to the backend cluster. Defaults to 1024.
trans-unit.target: 对后端集群的最大并行请求数。默认值为1024。
